artist: David Deuchar; After Hans Holbein the Younger
description:
two images on one page:

upper image:seated figure with large wide brim hat; skeleton at right peaking under hat; man with pack facing figure; in a rectangular frame with figures standing on either side

lower image: group of richly dressed men left and center; poor woman and child right front; skeleton behind woman reaching for man in front of group; in a rectangular frame; woman on pedestal left; man on pedestal right holding scythe; candles above and skeleton lying below image
dimension:
4 1/2 × 3 11/16 in. (11.43 × 9.37 cm) (image, sheet, upper image)
5 1/16 × 3 7/8 in. (12.86 × 9.84 cm) (image, sheet, lower image)
11 11/16 × 9 7/16 in. (29.69 × 23.97 cm) (mount)
marks:
Signature, and Inscription

upper image in plate See Inscription
title: Print
